entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET Tutorial]: ASP.NET Core for Beginners | YouTube Playlist | ContosoCrafts #43104
  • Consider adding an analyzer to detect when the Blazor Virtualize component is used in an element that doesn't permit child div elements #43102
  • Add more info to HttpLoggingMiddleware when response hasn't started, or request/response body are empty #43101
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Webassembly - StateAsChanged not fire using IAsyncEnumerable #43098
  • Flaky Analyzers on latest .NET preview #43097
  • Update to Bootstrap 5.2 #43096
  • Custom ModelBinder and complex objects deserialization #43095
  • Update SPA templates to remove all deprecation warnings #43094
    7.0-rc2
  • Add a server side buffer limit #43093
  • IFormFile.OpenReadStream() “stream.ReadTimeout”引发了类型“System.InvalidOperationException”的异常 #43092
  • Blazor WASM terrible runtime performance from mobile browser #43090
  • Quarantine FrameworkNotFoundExceptionLogged_File #43087
  • Blazor Wasm is not Caching DLL files when loaded from IFrame #43086
  • How to use the feature in aspnetcore Http.Request to begin processing the entity body before the complete contents of the body have been received. #43084
    Discussions
  • 项目发布生成单个文件是否可以将wwwroot中的文件一并打包 #43081
    Backlog
  • Create analyzer that warns against checking if HttpRequest.ContentLength > N #43080

Closed

  • Build WASM DevServer By Default #39357
  • Update Release Manifests with New Packages #39027
  • `msftbot` removes `Needs Author Feedback` when dotnet member comments #38135
  • [Performance] Investigate bi-modality of some benchmarks #37465
    .NET 7 Planning
  • jQuery License outdated #42815
    7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Enable cancellation of navigation events #42877
    7.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #43085
  • Blazor Hosted WASM app cannot be published as runtime-dependent if not self-contained from dotnet CLI #43068
  • WhiteSource | @microsoft/signalr | node-fetch version #43091
  • Allow HttpMethodAttribute (HttpGet, HttpPost, etc) to apply to class #43071
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularCounter_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Increment" button is less than 3:1. #42367
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_Zoom: Two scroll bars appear at 400% zoom on the page. #42345
    7.0-rc1
  • Extracting and setting values in Middleware vs Filter #43074
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: json #43031
  • Perf regression: caching #43078
  • RequestAborted token should stay identical once retrieved #42547
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppLogin_ScreenReader: NVDA is not announcing the status message after login with invalid attempt. #42396
    7.0-rc1
  • signalr? typed HubConnection from console, not the host. #42923

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CODEOWNERS to catch more API updates #43105
    area-infrastructure
  • Kestrel Content-Length handling changes #43103
    area-runtime
  • Add more info to UnrecognizedMediaType #43100
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Update branding to 2.1.37 #43099
    2.1.x
  • Mark SignalR SourceGen as not shipping for RC and RTM #42720
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc1
  • Updated jquery dependency to v3.6.0 #43060
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Follow-up for cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #43079
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • IISDeployer: Harden stop/start and dump sites #43058
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Quarantine FrameworkNotFoundExceptionLogged_File #43088
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • RequestAbort token stays the same after abort #43082
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Fix accepting simultaneous connections #43065
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Options #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • Throw from OnConnected and OnDisconnected when using client results #42447
    area-signalr
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add RateLimiting libraries to SharedFx #43047
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    area-infrastructure
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
